Lyric:
[00:05.360]I Want My Tears Back
[00:07.740]
[00:41.860]The treetops' the chimneys'
[00:44.490]
[00:45.110]The snowbed stories' winter grey
[00:48.730]Wildflowers' those meadows of heaven'
[00:53.170]Wind in the wheat
[00:55.170]
[00:55.670]A railroad across waters'
[00:58.610]The scent of grandfatherly love
[01:02.480]Blue bayous' Decembers'
[01:05.560]Moon through a dragonfly's wings
[01:09.070]Where is the wonder? where's the awe?
[01:11.450]
[01:12.310]Where's dear Alice knocking on the door?
[01:16.380]Where's the trapdoor that takes me there?
[01:18.940]Where the real is shattered by a Mad March Hare?
[01:22.810]Where is the wonder? where's the awe?
[01:25.990]Where are the sleepless nights I used to live for?
[01:30.190]Before the years take me
[01:32.680]I wish to see the lost in me
[01:36.660]
[01:41.780]I Want My Tears Back!
[01:43.910]
[01:48.290]I Want My Tears Back Now!
[01:50.840]
